Join the 100 Club

Be an even bigger part of the mission.

Image courtesy of Rannoch Adventure

We're working hard to reach our target of over £100,000 in support for our charities, but we're faced with costs of over £80,000 just to get to the start line. For our mission to be realised, we need to fund a boat, technical and life-saving equipment, on-shore support, food and other operational costs. There's a big list!

It's a huge target that we can only achieve through a combination of the team's savings, corporate sponsorship (our support-oars) and the 100 club.

The 100 Club

Be one of the first to donate £100 and get your name on the boat along with other exclusive ways to become part of the extended Status Row team!



Corporate Sponsors

Is your business looking to gain exposure on a global scale? Get in touch to discuss our corporate sponsorship options.
